data.name: VEGA Conflict - Python Pack (Discounted)
data.detailed_description:
Take your fleet to the next level with the Python Pack! It contains:

Python Cutter (x5) - With speed and aggression, the Python Cutter will set you up for the perfect battle!

7500 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to enhance the performance of your Python Cutters:

- SICO Missile II (x15)
- Fusion Thrusters III (x5)
- Blast Shield III (x5)
- Zynthium V (x20)
data.about_the_game:
Take your fleet to the next level with the Python Pack! It contains:

Python Cutter (x5) - With speed and aggression, the Python Cutter will set you up for the perfect battle!

7500 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to enhance the performance of your Python Cutters:

- SICO Missile II (x15)
- Fusion Thrusters III (x5)
- Blast Shield III (x5)
- Zynthium V (x20)
data.short_description: The Python Pack is rammed to the teeth with attitude! Get Python Cutters and a full set of equipment to deal out the ultimate damage to your enemies.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
